document.full_text: a suicide bomber killed 10 people in an attack on wednesday on peace talks between tribal elders in afghanistan's eastern kunar province, a volatile area where insurgents have gained ground in recent months.
document.title: bomber kills 10 in afghan gathering in east
lines_and_colors: a suicide bomber killed 10 people in an attack on wednesday on peace talks between tribal elders in afghanistan's eastern kunar province, a volatile area where insurgents have gained ground in recent months.
